attributes.action: Get rid of the television licence
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to completely scrap the television licence because it is out dated and no longer needed. The BBC isn’t impartial when it comes to things like politics therefore taxpayers shouldn’t be made to pay for a tv licence when it is essentially there to fund the BBC. Make the BBC advertise and bring in its own revenue.
attributes.background: I want parliament to scrap the television licence as it is out dated and no longer needed.
